extendedInfo.description: Now start the new journey for Destroyer.Compare with old version, this new version improved performance and fixed freezing upThis game is adapted from "otem Destroyer" -- classical physics engine game.It is a funny physical game. If you like Angry Bird, Shoot u, Bubble Ball, you will like this one also.keywords: physics, physical, Destroy, gravityYour task is to bomb various obstacles but at the same time you should be careful to not let the penguin fall to the ground, or the task fail.How to play:.Wooden box, tires and balloons can be bombed. Click the item to bomb it..Black iron canât be bombed. It is safe for penguin to fall on it..Be careful, you have fixed number of bombs. After you used all bombs and the penguin doesnât fall to the ground, you pass the level. Or you fail.Features:.140 levels. Enjoy the process of game.. GameBox: submit your high score to our gamebox, so you can challenge anyone of the world..You can try different ways to complete the task.More levels are coming soon...Reviews:by Greg (January 25, 2011)Awesome game. If u like angry birds and lite constuction. U will like this. All about strategyby Droid (January 17, 2011)Fun to destroy boxes :)by Lorianne (April 15, 2011)I love physics based games thats why i like angry birds. This is different but still a ton of fun and really challengingby Julia (April 12, 2011)Very fun to play. It is so addicting!

reviews.title: TRULY AWFUL PROGRAMMING...
reviews.comment: Menu forces portrait, game forces landscape. Needlessly clicky level selection screen orientates randomly. Level progression random. Inadequate instructions. This is free because no one in their right mind would pay.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: *Major glitch* when you fail at a level, you MUST wait for the Game Over animation to finish before you hit retry. HITTING BEFORE WILL END NEW GAME
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool game. Minor issues
reviews.comment: There seems to be a delay when you hit retry and start again, the submit score option comes up just as youre already starting, forcing another restart

reviews.comment: Annoying! If fail level, have to wait for submit screen before hitting retry, otherwise pops up when playing. If fixed 4 stars, for now 2 & uninstall.

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Good entertaining game except it keeps failing me out of rhe blue and it gets really annoying
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: GR8 game. Finally solved all puzzles over time.  There\'s been no updates since I\'ve started playing months ago, so it must be an abandoned game.  I love to see a create you own level in s future update (when ever that is).  They should make new game with updated graphics and more than one background and soundtrack.  I\'d pay for that.\tFor now since I\'m done with it, I\'m uninstalling it.  Thanks to the developers for a funny and wild ride.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its maybe not the best graphically bt its pretty simple and easy to play great time killer
